title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ, which involves opening the ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example on XML files by default:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file called 'test.xml'
3. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content
4. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'

Observed Behavior:
- Nothing happens when selecting 'Default Text Editor'
- The scripted resource editor example is still active

NOTES: Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types. It should open a new editor on the file because the editor type is different.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file called 'test.xml'
3. Select the 'test.xml' file in the Navigator
4. Right-click on the 'test.xml' file and choose 'Open With...'
5. Select 'Default Text Editor'

Expected Behavior:
- A new editor should open for the 'test.xml' file
- The scripted resource editor example should not be active
